name: Polarise
description:
:

Polarise is a 2.5D local co-op platformer where each level grows vertically.

You and your friend will have to be coordinated and use the power of the magnetism to overcome different obstacles and situations that will block your way. 

Will you two make it to the exit?

DEVELOPED BY: 

BURROBIRRAI (EVENT HORIZON SCHOOL TURIN, YEAR 1 - 2017/2018)

GAME DESIGN:
Morgan Volpe 
Enrico Martina 

PROGRAMMING:
Ettore Palma
Ismaele Evangelisti

3D ART:
Alejandro Maccagnano

CONCEPT ART:
Antonio Benenati
Sara Bonato

SOUND DESIGN:
Ismaele Evangelisti
